titles.title: A resolution to make majority party appointments to Senate Committees under paragraph 3 (a) and (b) of Rule XXV for the One Hundred and Third Congress.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Makes majority party appointments to the following Senate Committees: (1) Budget; (2) Rules and Administration; (3) Small Business; (4) Veterans' Affairs; and (5) Aging.
